user.title: 2N Intercom Setup - Connection
user.description: Configure connection to your 2N Intercom device

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of the intercom (e.g., 192.168.1.100)
data_description.port: HTTP/HTTPS port on the device (leave default unless changed)
data_description.protocol: Use HTTP or HTTPS based on device configuration
data_description.username: Device login username for API access
data_description.verify_ssl: Enable only if the HTTPS certificate is trusted by Home Assistant

data_description.name: Displayed name in Home Assistant
data_description.enable_camera: Create the camera entity for snapshots and streaming
data_description.enable_doorbell: Create the doorbell entity for ring detection
data_description.relay_count: How many relays you want to configure (0-4)
data_description.called_id: Select which account should ring. Choose All calls to ring on every button.

data_description.relay_number: Physical relay number on the device (1-4)
data_description.relay_device_type: Door creates a switch, gate creates a cover
data_description.relay_pulse_duration: How long to activate the relay (ms)
